home.title: AI Tattoo Generator | Create Realistic Tattoos with AR Preview
home.description: Turn your tattoo idea into a hyper-realistic design in seconds. Our AI tool offers endless styles and lets you preview it on your skin with AR, so you can commit with 100% confidence. Try it now for free!
home.keywords: AI tattoo generator, realistic tattoo maker, AR tattoo preview, custom tattoo designs, free tattoo

generate.title: Free AI Tattoo Generator: Custom Designs, Styles & AR Preview
generate.description: See how to create your perfect tattoo in 3 simple steps. Our AI tool lets you generate unlimited designs, customize endless styles, and preview it on your skin before you commit. Get your high-res tattoo design ready for your artist.
generate.keywords: free AI tattoo generator, custom tattoo designs, unlimited tattoo designs, high resolution

categories.title: AI Tattoo Ideas & Styles | Explore 100s of Unique Designs
categories.description: Find your next tattoo inspiration in our AI-generated gallery. Browse hundreds of designs across styles like Japanese, Minimalist, Watercolor, and Tribal. See an idea you love? Customize it instantly with our AI Tattoo Generator. Discover your perfect style today!
categories.keywords: tattoo ideas, tattoo styles, Japanese tattoos, minimalist tattoos, watercolor tattoos

creations.title: AI Tattoo Gallery - User Creations & Inspiration
creations.description: Explore amazing AI-generated tattoos created by our community. Get inspired and discover new ideas for your next tattoo project.
creations.keywords: AI tattoo gallery, user tattoo creations, tattoo inspiration, community tattoo designs

pricing.title: AI Tattoo Generator Pricing | Flexible Plans & Full Access
pricing.description: Find the perfect plan for our AI Tattoo Generator. Get unlimited designs, high-resolution downloads, and full access starting at just $12.99. Choose your plan and start creating today!
pricing.keywords: tattoo generator pricing, AI tattoo subscription, premium tattoo features, unlimited
